best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Use role=\"combobox\" on the input and role=\"listbox\"/\"option\" on the results.
Announce changes using aria-live or by updating aria-activedescendant.
Keep keyboard interaction consistent (Enter to select, Escape to close).
Ensure pointer and keyboard interactions stay in sync.
Debounce expensive remote lookups to reduce jitter.
